name: CyberVinny2014
description:
In the bleak cyberpunk dystopia future year of 2014, life is cheap and the only currency that matters is Quick Looks.

Pilot your tank, kill games, and gather quick looks.

Requires a controller to play.

[Updates 8-19]: Made opening scroll less jenky, support more controllers besides xbox controllers (hopefully), fixed spawn rate and wii spawn rate

[Updates 8-19 Part 2]: Added keyboard controls, fixed another issue with wii spawn rate
